reviews.review_msg: Cares deeply about what she teaches. A bit dogmatic. Very tough marker when she chooses to be, but not outright unfair. Although fine enough in person, she tends to be exceptionally condescending in emails, and her listening/comprehension skills could do with improvement. I would not take her again, but with her zeal, I understand why others would.

Professor Leow is one of my favourite English Professors I have ever had a class with! She's super sweet, caring, makes time for her students even if you need to meet outside of her hours (she'll schedule a zoom meeting), and gives actual feedback on your work. I have had professors who will hand you a mark and leave it at that, not with her!
